name: Sports Showdown
description:
This was for the MixNJam 2020 Game Jam!

Play various sports in this "Sports Arcade" genre combo! Play different sports using "WASD" and the mouse.

Code by me made during the jam.
Art by W.L made during the jam.
Additional music and sounds from https://www.freesoundeffects.com/ and https://patrickdearteaga.com/

~
~

~

~

--------------------------------------------SPOILER------------------------------------------

Sports Showdown is really an atmospheric horror escape game where you control several students trying to escape a haunted school with a deadly killer. The genres mixed are horror, survival, stealth, and escape room (as the main themes). Hope you enjoy, I only had about 1 full day to work on this jam but it was very fun!
